name: GUI_HP_MULTIPLIER
doc: Determines the scale that's used to display damage numbers and HP. Also used for the HP values in Saving Grace and Extra Life

name: APPARITION_MIN_BONES_REQUIRED
doc: How many files need to be in the bones folder before Kummitus starts spawning

name: BIOME_APPARITION_CHANCE
doc: Used for Kummitus state transitions 0 -> 3

name: CELLFACTORY_CELLDATA_MAX_COUNT
doc: The max number of individual materials permitted to exist by the engine

name: PARTICLE_EMITTER_MAX_PARTICLES
doc: Added in the Mar 11, 2023 patch

name: INVENTORY_STASH_X
doc: Unused

name: INVENTORY_STASH_Y
doc: Unused

name: INVENTORY_DEBUG_X
doc: Used to position the 'Magical Materia Summoner' background grid in noita_dev.exe

name: INVENTORY_DEBUG_Y
doc: Used to position the 'Magical Materia Summoner' background grid in noita_dev.exe

name: UI_BARS_SCALE
doc: Multiplier for the health bar vertical size

name: UI_BARS_POS_X
doc: Offsets the UI elements for quick and full inventory except the backgrounds, also moves the wand boxes in the inventory (the one where you can rearrange spells on wands)

name: UI_BARS_POS_Y
doc: Offsets the UI elements for quick and full inventory except the backgrounds, also moves the wand boxes in the inventory (the one where you can rearrange spells on wands)

name: UI_BARS2_OFFSET_X
doc: Offsets the bars at the right side of the screen (Health, Mana etc) (has no Y equivalent)

name: UI_QUICKBAR_OFFSET_X
doc: Offsets the inventory in the top left where the wands and item are stored (inventory_quick)

name: UI_QUICKBAR_OFFSET_Y
doc: Offsets the inventory in the top left where the wands and item are stored (inventory_quick)

name: UI_FULL_INVENTORY_OFFSET_X
doc: Spell inventory offset (has no Y equivalent)

name: DEBUG_PRINT_COMPONENT_UPDATOR_ORDER
doc: When enabled makes Noita write the component update order to 'temptemp/component_system_order.txt' relative to the installation path

name: DEBUG_DEMO_MODE
doc: Removes all menu options for exiting the game and automatically starts a new run when no inputs have been received for some time

name: DEBUG_INTRO_PLAY_ALWAYS
doc: Makes the game play the intro sequence as if the intro_has_played persistent flag doesn't exist. It never plays the intro if mods are enabled

name: DESIGN_PLAYER_PICKUP_ENABLED
doc: Controls whether PhysicsPickUpComponent does anything
